citations.narrative:
During inspection it was noted that there were one door flap between the inside and outside portion of an enclosures
where the frame was pulling away from the wall leaving exposed screws in the gap created. There were also three other
door flaps that had cracked around the bottom hinge. One of the doors no longer closed normally.
Exposed screws and cracked doors can cause injury to animals and become harder to sanitize.
Housing facilities must be kept in good repair, and they must protect the animals from injury, contain the animals securely,
and restrict other animals from entering.
Correction Date: June, 4th 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(a) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
During inspection it was noted that there were one door flap between the inside and outside portion of an enclosures 
where the frame was pulling away from the wall leaving exposed screws in the gap created. There were also three other 
door flaps that had cracked around the bottom hinge. One of the doors no longer closed normally.  
Exposed screws and cracked doors can cause injury to animals and become harder to sanitize.  
Housing facilities must be kept in good repair, and they must protect the animals from injury, contain the animals securely, 
and restrict other animals from entering. 
Correction Date: June, 4th 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
